c74object.name: fftjit.bankScrubber
c74object.digest: Recalls and interpolated between FFTJIT Spectrum Bank frames
c74object.description: Recalls and interpolated between FFTJIT Spectrum Bank frames

inlet.digest: Frame number to recall; Decimals are interpreted as a percent interpolation to the next frame.

method.name: frames
method.digest: a list of 2 ints: sets the two interpolated frames
method.description: a list of 2 ints: sets the two interpolated frames

method.name: interp
method.digest: float: sets the interpolation between the two frames 0 is to the first 1 is to the second
method.description: float: sets the interpolation between the two frames 0 is to the first 1 is to the second

method.name: frame
method.description: outputs the nth frame prepended with frame
